definition: Look out for yourself, or heaven and earth will combine to destroy you./Every man for himself, and the Devil take the hindmost.
pinyin: ren2 bu4 wei4 ji3 , tian1 zhu1 di4 mie4

definition: as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
self/oneself/sixth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/sixth in order/letter "F" or Roman "VI" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/hexa
to put (a criminal) to death/to punish
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown
